page.title: 03Hobbies in Barkestone
page.content: For young people the most common recreation is cycling.What with BMXs coming into popularity a lot of people are buying bikes and such like.A BMX is a stunt bike.There is an over15 football club for Barkestone just outside the village.In Redmile there is a small recreation park for young children.Men play things like darts,dominoes,and cards.Women play bingo and sew and knit.Some people go swimming regularly to places like Melton and Bingham.Some people swim for clubs and some just for leisure. Some people go ice-skating at Nottingham.People sometimes rollerskate at a special hall in Bingham.There are tennis courts at Hose and our school goes every wednesday.A lot of people go to football matches.Sport is the most common recreation.
